00044 Entree& Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::readOn(Entree& s )
00045 {
00046   s >> le_champ_front;
00047   le_champ_ext.typer("Champ_front_uniforme");
00048   le_champ_ext.valeurs().resize(1,dimension);
00049   return s;
00050 }

00059 
00060 void Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::completer()
00061 {
00062   Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::completer()" << finl;
00063   const Zone_Cl_dis_base& la_zone_Cl = zone_Cl_dis();
00064   const Equation_base& eqn = la_zone_Cl.equation();
00065   const Navier_Stokes_std& eqn_hydr = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,eqn);
00066   const Zone_VDF& zone_vdf = ref_cast(Zone_VDF,eqn.zone_dis().valeur());
00067   const Champ_P0_VDF& pression = ref_cast(Champ_P0_VDF,eqn_hydr.pression().valeur());
00068   const IntTab& face_voisins  = zone_vdf.face_voisins();
00069   const DoubleVect& volumes_entrelaces = zone_vdf.volumes_entrelaces();
00070   const DoubleVect& face_surfaces = zone_vdf.face_surfaces();
00071 
00072   la_zone_VDF = zone_vdf;
00073   pression_interne = pression;
00074 
00075   const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis());
00076   int nb_faces_loc = le_bord.nb_faces();
00077   int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00078   int face;
00079 
00080   coeff.resize(nb_faces_loc);
00081   trace_pression_int.resize(nb_faces_loc);
00082 
00083   for (face=ndeb; face<ndeb+nb_faces_loc; face++)
00084     if (face_voisins(face,0) != -1)
00085       coeff[face-ndeb] = volumes_entrelaces[face]/face_surfaces[face];
00086     else
00087       coeff[face-ndeb] = - volumes_entrelaces[face]/face_surfaces[face];
00088 
00089   Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::completer() ok" << finl;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::mettre_a_jour(double temps)
00093 {
00094 // Cerr<<"Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::mettre_a_jour"<<finl;
00095   Cond_lim_base::mettre_a_jour(temps);
00096 
00097   const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis());
00098   int ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
00099   int nb_faces_loc = le_bord.nb_faces();
00100 
00101   assert(pression_interne.non_nul());
00102   for (int face=ndeb; face<ndeb+nb_faces_loc; face++)
00103     trace_pression_int[face-ndeb] = pression_interne->valeur_au_bord(face);
00104 }
00105 
00106 double Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::flux_impose(int face) const
00107 {
00108   if (le_champ_front.valeurs().size()==1)
00109     return (trace_pression_int[face] + coeff[face]*le_champ_front(0,0));
00110   else if (le_champ_front.valeurs().line_size()==1)
00111     return (trace_pression_int[face] + coeff[face]*le_champ_front(face,0));
00112   else
00113     Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::flux_impose erreur" << finl;
00114   exit();
00115   return 0.;
00116 }
00117 
00118 double Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::flux_impose(int  , int ) const
00119 {
00120   Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::flux_impose(int  , int )" << finl;
00121   Cerr << "On ne sait imposer que la composante normale du gradient" << finl;
00122   return 0.;
00123 }
00124 
00125 double Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::grad_P_imp(int face) const
00126 {
00127   const Milieu_base& mil=ma_zone_cl_dis->equation().milieu();
00128   if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,mil.masse_volumique()))
00129     {
00130       const Champ_Uniforme& rho=ref_cast(Champ_Uniforme,mil.masse_volumique());
00131       double d_rho = rho(0,0);
00132       if (le_champ_front.valeurs().size()==1)
00133         return le_champ_front(0,0)/d_rho;
00134       else if (le_champ_front.valeurs().line_size()==1)
00135         return le_champ_front(face,0)/d_rho;
00136       else
00137         Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::grad_P_imp() erreur" << finl;
00138     }
00139   else
00140     {
00141 // quasi compressible
00142       const DoubleTab& tab_rho = mil.masse_volumique().valeurs();
00143       int elem = la_zone_VDF->face_voisins(face,0);
00144       if (elem==-1)
00145         elem = la_zone_VDF->face_voisins(face,1);
00146       double d_rho = tab_rho(elem);
00147       if (le_champ_front.valeurs().size()==1)
00148         return le_champ_front(0,0)/d_rho;
00149       else if (le_champ_front.valeurs().line_size()==1)
00150         return le_champ_front(face,0)/d_rho;
00151       else
00152         Cerr << "Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::grad_P_imp() erreur" << finl;
00153     }
00154   exit();
00155   return 0.;
00156 }
00157 
00158 int Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::
00159 compatible_avec_discr(const Discretisation_base& discr) const
00160 {
00161   if (discr.que_suis_je() == "VDF")
00162     return 1;
00163   else if (discr.que_suis_je() == "VDF_Interface" || discr.que_suis_je() == "VDF_Front_Tracking")
00164     return 1;
00165   else
00166     {
00167       err_pas_compatible(discr);
00168       return 0;
00169     }
00170 }
00171 
00172 int Sortie_libre_Gradient_Pression_impose::
00173 compatible_avec_eqn(const Equation_base& eqn) const
00174 {
00175   Motcle dom_app=eqn.domaine_application();
00176   Motcle Hydraulique="Hydraulique";
00177   Motcle indetermine="indetermine";
00178   if ( (dom_app==Hydraulique) || (dom_app==indetermine) )
00179     return 1;
00180   else
00181     {
00182       err_pas_compatible(eqn);
00183       return 0;
00184     }
00185 }
